name: jesta
description: Stencila plugin for executable documents using JavaScript

input.description: The URL to read content from.

output.description: The URL to write the content to.

from.description: Format to import the document from. Defaults to the file extension (or media type, for remote URLs).

to.description: Format to export the documents to. Defaults to the file extension.

cache.description: Use and store cached content (for http:// URLs only).

upcast.description: Upcast the document after it is imported?

downcast.description: Downcast the document before it is exported?

validate.description: Validate the document after it is imported?

featureList.title: decode
featureList.description: Decode content of a specific format into a Stencila node.

format.description: The format to be decoded from

featureList.title: encode
featureList.description: Encode a Stencila node to content of a specific format.

format.description: The format to be encoded to

theme.description: The theme for the exported content (only applies to some formats)

featureList.title: get
featureList.description: Get a variable from a document.

document.description: The id of the document to get the variable from.

featureList.title: import
featureList.description: Import a document from a URL.

input.description: The URL to read content from.

format.description: Format to import the document from. Defaults to the file extension (or media type, for remote URLs).

cache.description: Use and store cached content (for http:// URLs only).

upcast.description: Upcast the document after it is imported?

validate.description: Validate the document after it is imported?

featureList.title: pull
featureList.description: Pull file/s from a URL to the file system

output.description: The file path to write to

input.description: The URL to read content from.

cache.description: Use and store cached content (for http:// URLs only).

featureList.title: select
featureList.description: Select child nodes from a node.

query.description: The query to run against the node.

lang.description: The language that the query is written in.

featureList.title: set
featureList.description: Set a variable in a document.

document.description: The id of the document to set the variable in.

name.description: The name of the variable to set.

value.description: The value to to set the variable to.

featureList.title: validate
featureList.description: Validate a node against the Stencila Schema.

force.description: Coerce the node to ensure it is valid (e.g. dropping properties)?

output.description: The URL to write the content to.
